data.title: Network of Dirk Boogmans, Analysis of 75 relations
data.meta_description: Identify the source of Dirk Boogmans's network. Among these 23 positions of which Director/Board Member at BNP Paribas Fortis SA/NV, he knows 75 people directly.
data.text:
Finance/Rental/LeasingFinance

BNP Paribas Personal Finance SA engages in financial and consumer credit services. It offers consumer and auto loans, home financing, and credit cards. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

Miscellaneous Commercial ServicesCommercial Services

Federation of Enterprises in Belgium ASBL/VZW fka Federation des Entreprises de Belgique is the only multi-sector employers' organization representing companies in all three regions of Belgium. Its members, Belgium's leading sectoral federations, represent companies in key industrial and service sectors. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.

Investment ManagersFinance

Participatiemaatschappij Vlaamse NV (VPM), also known as the Flemish Participation Company, is the investment arm of the Flemish Government based in Brussels, Belgium. Established in 2006, they focus on the management of the Flemish government's minority participation in the GIMV1 fund. GIMV-Gewestelijke Investerings Maatschappij Vlaanderen is a private equity firm founded in 1980 to provide capital to the Flemish industry, primarily in the ICT and life sciences sectors.

Major BanksFinance

Banca Nazionale del Lavoro SpA provides banking and financial services to households, enterprises, and public sector organizations. Its products include customer, certificate, medium and long-term, and other deposits from banks and customers. The bank also offers loans including short, medium, and long-term financing; mortgage and finance lease. It provides financial intermediary services including factoring, leasing, consumer credit, and equity investment. The company was founded on August 15, 1913 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

Investment ManagersFinance

BNP Paribas Fortis Bank SA/NV (Private Banking) (BNP Paribas Fortis) is the private banking division of BNP Paribas Fortis SA/NV, ultimately owned by BNP Paribas SA (EPA: BNP, ADR: BNPQY) in France. Headquartered in Brussels, BNP Paribas Fortis provides a range of financial solutions for high-net worth individuals including financial advisory services, insurance products and the management of discretionary portfolios.

Finance/Rental/LeasingFinance

Arval Service Lease SA rents commercial and industrial vehicles and motorcars. It provides car rental services to companies, tourists, marriage parties and ceremonies. The firm offers cars for rent on daily, weekly and contract basis. The company was founded on November 6, 1989 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

Regional BanksFinance

Febelfin ASBL provides banking services for refugees and asylum seekers. The firm fries to reconcile the interests of members with the policy makers, supervisors, trade associations and pressure groups. The company is headquartered in Bruxelles, Belgium.

Finance/Rental/LeasingFinance

Part of BNP Paribas SA, BNP Paribas Leasing Solutions is a French company that provides financing and leasing solutions. The company is based in Paris, France. Neil Pein has been the CEO of the company since 2024.

Financial ConglomeratesFinance

BNP Paribas UK Holdings Ltd. provides investor services, asset management, advising and financing on mergers and acquisitions as well as leveraged buyouts and foreign exchange currency risk management services. The firm also provides private banking services through BNP Paribas Private Bank. The company was founded in 2000 is headquartered in London, UK.

Financial ConglomeratesFinance

Adviesbeheer Gimv Health & Care 2016 NV is an investment holding Belgian company that provides management, investment, real estate, and public relation services. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Antwerp, Belgium.

Investment Banks/BrokersFinance

Exane SA provides securities brokerage services. It operates in the following business areas: cash equities, derivatives, and asset Management. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

BiotechnologyHealth Technology

MyCartis NV develops technologies for healthcare personalization needs. It offers Evalution, a multiplex analysis platform to develop protein and nucleic-acid based clinical biomarkers. The company provides disruptive solutions in the fields of clinical and translational research for various applications in the detection of proteins and nucleic acids, such as sandwich immunoassays, antibody assays, genotyping assays, and mutation analysis assays to customers and partners. It offers products for various disease areas, including cell signalling, cardiovascular, oncology, and preeclampsia. The company was founded by Koen Kas in August 2004 and is headquartered in Ghent, Belgium.

Miscellaneous Commercial ServicesCommercial Services

The Belgian Venture Capital & Private Equity Association provides equity capital to enterprises not quoted on a stock market. The firm develops new products and technologies to expand working capital, to make acquisitions or to strengthen a companyâ€™s balance sheet. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.
